Entries.dating_Abigail: %Abel is blushing, but she looks happy.
Entries.fall_Thu: #$1 AbigailHAND#Last night I dreamt that my left hand had turned into a gigantic %noun. Does that mean anything?#$e#%Abel doesn't seem to be interested in talking right now.
Entries.Event_Grave3: Oh, it's because I'm skinny... isn't it? Ugh...$u^Why? I'm just as strong as you!$a#$b#I'm not some fragile prince.. I can take care of myself!$a#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Entries.fall_26: Will I see you tomorrow at the Spirit's Eve festival? Look for me in the haunted maze.$h
Entries.spring_23: Well, tomorrow is the flower dance. Dancing is alright, but they make me wear this stupid blue suit...$s

Entries.Introduction: Hello! You must be @, the new farmer. I'm Caroline.#$e#My husband runs the general store here. And have you met my sone, Abel? He's the pale one with the purple hair.
Entries.Mon8: #$1 Caroline23#When we first moved to Pelican Town I would take secret walks to the Wizard's tower. Don't tell Pierre, he has jealousy issues.#$e#Abel was born about a year after we moved to Pelican Town. I wonder if he'll ever experience life outside the valley?
Entries.Sat: Is it just me, or does Abel have an unhealthy interest in doom and gloom?#$e#Maybe I'm just too old to understand.
Entries.Sat_inlaw_Abigail: Dinner's been a lot quieter since Abel moved out...#$e#No, not because he used to chew with his mouth open!$h
Entries.summer_Sat: Is it just me, or does Abel look a little pale?#$e#Maybe I'm just worrying about his too much.
Entries.summer_Sat_inlaw_Abigail: How's Abel's health? He's always been such a pale boy. Hopefully the farm lifestyle puts a little color in his cheeks.
Entries.fall_Sat: Is it just me, or does Abel play too many video games?#$e#Maybe I'm a little old-fashioned.
Entries.fall_Wed6: You know, I used to want to be a farmer myself. Well, more like a rancher.#$e#I always loved movies about the wild west when I was a girl.

Entries.OneKid_3: I can't believe I'm a "dad"... life is weird.$h
Entries.Good_1: Did you hear that? Sometimes I'm convinced this house is haunted.$u

Entries.summer_20: I wonder if my brother will ever have the courage to ask Abel out?

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Do you think Sebastian and Abel will ever hook up?#$e#Heh... now that I'm married I'm trying to get everyone else married too.
Do you think Sabrina and Abel will ever hook up?#$e#Heh... now that I'm married I'm trying to get everyone else married too.

Entries.eventSeen_4: Abel's going through a rebellious phase... I get it.#$e#He'll wise up when he has to make his first mortgage payment!$h
Entries.Mon4_inlaw_Abigail: Hi, @. How's Abel doing? The shop hasn't been the same without him...
Entries.Thu8: #$1 pierre2#Does Abel look anything like me? Don't tell my wife, but sometimes I wonder if I'm really the father.$k$s#$e#Don't tell my wife, but I hate to cook dinner.
Entries.Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Hello, er... my son?$s^Hello, er... daughter?$s

Entries.108: ItemDelivery/Carving Pumpkins/Caroline wants to carve a pumpkin with her son. She asked you to bring her one from the farm./Bring Caroline a pumpkin./Caroline 276/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, the pumpkin! It's a good one... Abel will be so happy when he sees this. Thanks, @!$h
Entries.128: SecretLostItem/.../.../.../Abigail 191 100 129/-1/0/-1/false/That necklace! Where did you find it?$7#$b#Well, thanks for bringing it to me, @. My mom will never know...$h

Entries.1: It's a page from Abel's Diary^^'Things I love: the smell of carved pumpkin, keeping an amethyst under my pillow, chocolate cake, the thrill of spicy eel, and the comfort of Mom's blackberry cobbler (I like to eat!)'%revealtasteAbigail276%revealtasteAbigail66%revealtasteAbigail220%revealtasteAbigail226%revealtasteAbigail611

Entries.Phone_Pierre_Open_Rare: Abel! Your guinea pig is loose again! Come here *right now* and take care of this! $3#$b#Oh! Uh... Hello? Thank you for calling. Y... Yes, we're open until 5PM. Goodbye. *click*$4

Entries.Backwoods_MonsterGrave: Abel took a life to save mine...#I'll never forget that.

Entries.Caroline_like_AfterMovie: That wasn't bad! I'll have to ask Abel about it when I'm home, I'm sure he's seen it.$h

Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13593: I want to pull a prank on my Dad. I'll need {0}. Keep it secret :)      -Abel
